pages.text: The soul combiner is a special device used to infuse items with mob souls. When an $(l:runes/extraction)Soul Extraction Rune$(/l) connected to the same conduit network is activated, it will kill the mob and store its soul for later use.$(br)

Currently there are two types of items craft-able in the soul combiner. Placing a Blank Tarot Card in the first slot will create the associated Tarot Card. Placing a $(l:runes/spawner)Broken Spawner$(/l) in the first slot will craft a new mob spawner. The second slot must have $(l:basics/tear_handling)Tainted Sludge$(/l).
